keyMoments.title: Multiple Simultaneous Battles
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats engage in separate battles across Thriller Bark - Luffy vs Moria, Sanji vs Absalom, and Usopp vs Wild Zombies/Perona.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's ability to handle multiple threats simultaneously while separated.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Rescues Nami
keyMoments.description: Sanji crashes Absalom's forced wedding to rescue his crewmate Nami.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's fierce loyalty and protection of each other.

name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

keyMoments.title: Defending Thriller Bark
keyMoments.description: The Mysterious Four members (Moria and Absalom shown) engage the Straw Hats in separate battles to maintain control.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the organizational structure with each commander handling different threats.

keyMoments.title: Absalom's Failed Wedding
keyMoments.description: Absalom's attempt to force Nami into marriage is interrupted by Sanji, leading to a fierce battle.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Absalom's predatory nature and the depths he'll sink to.
